description: Lokalise is a collaborative translation platform.

actions.name: createComment
actions.description: Add comments to a key in your Lokalise project

actions.name: createKey
actions.description: Create one or more keys in your Lokalise project

actions.name: createProject
actions.description: Create a new project in your Lokalise team

actions.name: createTask
actions.description: Create a new task in your Lokalise project

actions.name: deleteKey
actions.description: Delete a key from your Lokalise project (software and marketing projects only)

actions.name: retrieveAComment
actions.description: Retrieve a specific comment on a key in your Lokalise project

actions.name: retrieveAKey
actions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific key in your Lokalise project

actions.name: retrieveAProject
actions.description: Retrieve detailed information about a Lokalise project

actions.name: retrieveTranslation
actions.description: Retrieve a specific translation from your Lokalise project

actions.name: updateKey
actions.description: Update properties of a key in your Lokalise project

actions.name: updateTranslation
actions.description: Update a translation in your Lokalise project

triggers.name: keyAdded
triggers.description: Trigger when a new key is added to your Lokalise project

triggers.name: keyUpdated
triggers.description: Trigger when a key is updated in your Lokalise project

triggers.name: translationUpdated
